value-below-min: Value is below the minimum for selected provider
below-min-swap: Below minimum swap value for selected provider
value-above-max: Value is above the maximum for selected provider
above-max-swap: Above maximum swap value for selected provider
refund: {currency} address for refund (if needed) from Changelly

providers.loading-rates: Please wait while we load provider rates...
providers.load-rate-error: An Error occurred while retrieving the rates for {from-currency} to {to-currency}. Please wait a moment and try again

warning.unable-validate-addr: Currently unable to validate addresses for {currency}. It is likely correct, but Please double check it is correct before sending.
warning.swap-only-mainnet: Swap is only available on mainnet
warning.kyber-token-list-update-failed: Failed to update Kyber Network available token list
warning.kyber-gasLimit-list-update-failed: Failed to update Kyber Network trade gasLimit list
warning.kyber-list-update-failed: Failed to update Kyber Network default information

notice.retrieve-changelly-rate-failed: Failed to retrieve Changelly rate from {fromCurrency} to {toCurrency}
notice.retrieve-bity-rate-failed: Failed to retrieve Bity rate from {fromCurrency} to {toCurrency}
notice.retrieve-kyber-rate-failed: Failed to retrieve Kyber Network rate from {fromCurrency} to {toCurrency}
notice.retrieve-simplex-rate-failed: Failed to retrieve Simplex rate from {fromCurrency} to {toCurrency}

tag-line.bity: Swap ETH, BTC, REP, or sell for fiat using your phone!
tag-line.changelly: Swap ETH, ERC20 tokens, and more!
tag-line.simplex: Buy crypto with a credit card!

exit-to-fiat.prev-verified: Your phone number is already verified.  Please continue below.
exit-to-fiat.popover-bic-swift: This is international bank routing number.
exit-to-fiat.popover-iban-num: This is international bank account number (IBAN).
exit-to-fiat.popover-email: Only used if any problems arise with the deposit, otherwise if omitted the value will be refunded to the sending address if any problems arise.
